body_html:
But why this throws exception ?

import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
b = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
c = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
r1 = tf.add(a, b)
r2 = tf.multiply(r1, c)

with tf.Session() as sess:
    h = sess.partial_run_setup([r1, r2], [a, b, c])
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r1, feed_dict={a: 1, b: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 3})
    
    print(res)

Which prints the following exception. :
InvalidArgumentError: Must run 'setup' before performing partial runs!

But why this throws exception ?
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
b = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
c = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
r1 = tf.add(a, b)
r2 = tf.multiply(r1, c)

with tf.Session() as sess:
    h = sess.partial_run_setup([r1, r2], [a, b, c])
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r1, feed_dict={a: 1, b: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 3})
    
    print(res)

Which prints the following exception. :
InvalidArgumentError: Must run 'setup' before performing partial runs!
body:
But why this throws exception ? 

```
import tensorflow as tf
a = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
b = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
c = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[])
r1 = tf.add(a, b)
r2 = tf.multiply(r1, c)

with tf.Session() as sess:
    h = sess.partial_run_setup([r1, r2], [a, b, c])
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r1, feed_dict={a: 1, b: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 2})
    res = sess.partial_run(h, r2, feed_dict={c: 3})
    
    print(res)
```
Which prints the following exception. :
`InvalidArgumentError: Must run 'setup' before performing partial runs!`
